thread.title: Jason Mraz Gets Married, Shares Wedding Picture
thread.title_full: Jason Mraz Gets Married, Shares Wedding Picture

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Jason Mraz Gets Married, Shares Wedding Picture
text:
Comments The 'I'm Yours' hitmaker exchanges wedding vows with his fiancee in a Virginia church. 
Jason Mraz is a married man. The "Lucky" hitmaker posted on his social media a picture of his bride with a caption, "Today I was made the luckiest man in the world." His wife is seen standing in the aisle, wearing a white dress and a floral headdress. Today I was made the luckiest man in the world. pic.twitter.com/re1yh9HAj0 � Jason Mraz (@jason_mraz) October 26, 2015 According to Inquirer, the 38-year-old singer tied the knot with his fiancee, Christina Carano, in an outdoor ceremony taking place at Historic Polegreen Church in Mechanicsville, Virginia. After the nuptials, he changed his online profile to "Singer/Songwriter/Husband." In an interview with Osider magazine, Mraz once gushed about his then-girlfriend, "She is whole-hearted in every action, is extremely generous, completely drama-free, and has the most intuitive-genius-mind in the kitchen. Not to mention her smile absolutely melts me." The couple reportedly met at her coffee shop in Hermosa Beach, California in 2007. They, however, didn't date until 2011.
